label-section.title: Custom desklet label (only visible if decorations are enabled)

links-text.description:
Each link has 4 attributes you can change: 
 - name that will be displayed,
 - icon name: you can choose any system icon,
 - command to be executed when clicked
 - true/false if you want the terminal to show up.
Each attribute must be separated by a comma and each link must be separated with an Enter key (newline).
Commas can be escaped with '\,' and newlines can be placed with '\n'.
You can open folders using ex. `nemo <path>` command.
If you need to see the output of a command, set the last attribute to true.
links-text.default:
Home folder,folder_home,nemo,false
My folder,folder,nemo,false
Root folder,disks,nemo /,false
Computer,computer,nemo computer://,false
Terminal,terminal,gnome-terminal,false
Some App,go-next-symbolic,top,true
Custom cmd\,\nls -alF,someicon,ls -alF --color=auto && bash,true
No Icon,,,false
Configure links\nin the settings.\nRight click\nthen configure.,settings,,false

icon-picker.description:
This setting does not impact the desklet. It's here for convenience.
You can browse through icons here and find their names easily.
icon-picker.tooltip: Click the icon on the right to browse. This setting is not used anywhere.

desklet-layout.description:
Choose how links should be laid out.
(You might also want to change text alignment.)
desklet-layout.tooltip: Pick a layout for this desklet.

column-number.tooltip: Increase or decrease the number of columns on the layout.

transparent-bg.description: Transparent background (works well with no decorations)
transparent-bg.tooltip: Select if you want a transparent background.

bg-color.tooltip: Set the color of the links background.

icon-size.tooltip: Increase or decrease the icon size (set to 0 to disable icons).

font.tooltip: Change font family ex. Ubuntu, Roboto, DejaVu Serif

size-font.tooltip: Increase or decrease the font size.

text-color.tooltip: Set the text color of this desklet.

scale-size.tooltip: Increase or decrease the size of this desklet using this scale factor.

use-custom-label.tooltip: Checking this box allows you to set a custom label in the field below.

custom-label.tooltip: Set your custom label here. This field is unavailable unless the checkbox above is enabled.
